Package com.sgp.sem3.crudapisbjavamvn.service

Class StudentService

java.lang.Object
com.sgp.sem3.crudapisbjavamvn.service.StudentService
@Service public class StudentService extends Object
Provides and Implements methods for CRUD operations on StudentRepository Uses StudentRepository to make perform CRUD operations on.
